snippet.title: Bum FIghts Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Bum Fights Gameplay Trailer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2347860/Bum_Fights/?beta=1

✨ Wishlist Now on Steam ✨ 

Get ready to brawl like never before in Bum Fights! Jump into the ultimate online multiplayer top-down shooter set in a nostalgic medieval world, where you rise from rags to riches as a penniless warrior fighting for survival and glory.

Experience fast paced action and intense combat as you battle other players in the arena, or team up to take on hordes of the undead. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, from rusty knives to throwing rocks, and fight until you’re the last one standing.

But beware: the competition is fierce, and only the strongest and most skilled will emerge victorious. With customizable characters and diverse game modes, there’s always a new challenge around the corner.

Gear up for battle and enter the arena to prove your worth as the Lord of the Bums!

Epic Cinematic Travel | Legends by Alex-Productions |
https://youtu.be/8qrdPFwkQfU
Music promoted by http://onsound.eu/


Legends by Alexander Nakarada (CreatorChords) | https://creatorchords.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Creative Commons / Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
